name: Moshi Monsters Moshling Zoo
description:
Immerse yourself in the world of Moshi Monsters! The world of Moshi Monsters is a zany and magical place, so you should fit right in with all the tomfoolery

around here!

Features

• Find ‘Em, Keep ‘Em! Search for ULTRA RARE Moshlings to add to your Moshling Zoo.
• Play Cool Mini-Games!
• Explore all new areas of Monstro City!
• Unlock rewards including achievements and super secret items!
